nodes.name: Top Door
nodes.note: No spawnAt and no junction below, because the door can be entered with just a crouch jump

strats.name: Crab Shaft Walljump Climb
strats.note: It's a really long one

strats.name: Frozen HiJump
strats.note: Differs from crab climb in that the crabs only serve as one-time stepping stone between platforms.

strats.name: Frozen SpringBall
strats.note: Differs from crab climb in that the crabs only serve as one-time stepping stone between platforms.

strats.name: Frozen Crabs
strats.note: Involves a Super to freeze a crab in midair.

to.note: There's nothing difficult about getting here suitless, but it does run a heavy risk of leading the player into suitless Maridia situations
This direct link is just for the shinespark
There's nothing difficult about getting here suitless, but it does run a heavy risk of leading the player into suitless Maridia situations
There's nothing difficult about getting here suitless, but it does run a heavy risk of leading the player into suitless Maridia situations

strats.name: Aqueduct Top Door Snailstep
strats.note: Involves waiting around for a snail to come along, in order to reach the door by jumping while standing on it.

nodes.name: Back-Side Botwoon
nodes.note: This represents fighting Botwoon from behind the wall. There is a frame where Botwoon clips past the wall and can be hit from the other side, but that would take so long with just Charge (possibly 30 minutes+) that Wave will just be required.

to.note: There's nothing difficult about getting here suitless, but it does run a heavy risk of leading the player into suitless Maridia situations
There's nothing difficult about getting here suitless, but it does run a heavy risk of leading the player into suitless Maridia situations
Direct link passing below. Passage above should go 1 -> 5 -> 4.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: The canComeInCharged with 180 frames remaining is intended to logically include an in-room short charge.

strats.name: Suitless Spark
strats.note: Coming in with zero momentum, all it takes is one non-hjb full height bounce forward, then activate.

to.note: Direct link passing below. Passage above should go 4 -> 5 -> 1.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Must take off Gravity to do mid-air morphs

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Must take off Gravity to do mid-air morphs

to.note: This link is only for the shinespark. Other strats should go 2 -> 1 -> 4.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: While that one walljump bear the end is a bit precise, it does not require a delayed walljump and so it is not considered a trickyWalljump.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: No water involved here, so no need for Gravity or canSuitlessMaridia.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: No water involved here, so no need for Gravity or canSuitlessMaridia.

to.note: Since this involves water and failure involves more water, it won't be expected without gravity suit unless suitless is expected

strats.name: Suitless Shinespark
strats.note: It takes a bit more time to set up the spark when suitless.

to.note: Since this involves water and failure involves more water, it shouldn't be expected without gravity suit unless suitless is expected

nodes.name: Draygon
nodes.note: The suitless kill expects either grapple, or Morph and the ability to destroy the turrets.

strats.name: Draygon HiJumpless Speedjump
strats.note: There is a very precise speed where the hjless speedjump is doable.

strats.name: Suitless shinespark
strats.note: Takes more time to setupd than suited. but you can spark from a bit farther out because of the water physics.

strats.name: Draygon Grapple Jump
strats.note: The ammo is to destroy the turret.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Doesn't require anything, but getting out does.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: There is a way to avoid taking damage through the room, even without mid-air unmorphing.

strats.name: Suitless
strats.note: There is a way to avoid taking damage through the room, even without mid-air unmorphing.

strats.name: HiJump Walljump
strats.note: HiJump also makes it possible to escape the water suitless.

strats.name: East Cactus Hjless Walljump
strats.note: It's precise, but it's doable without a delayed walljump so it doesn't require canTrickyWalljump.

strats.name: East Cactus Springwall
strats.note: Requires only Gravity because suitless requires HiJump anyway.

strats.name: Base
note: This requires taking off Gravity to do a mid-air morph.
There is a way to get across without taking any damage from spikes or Cacatacs, although it's a bit tricky.

to.note: This link refers specifically to crossing on frozen enemies. Failing here will lead to a softlock
This link refers specifically to crossing on frozen enemies. Failing here will lead to a softlock

nodes.name: Power Bomb (right Maridia sand pit room)

strats.name: Suitless
note: It's possible to get out of the sand suitless and without hjb after falling from the chute, by hugging the left side and moving quickly.
However, getting across the sand chute right-to-left or left-to-right without sinking isn't possible in those conditions.

nodes.name: Top Junction
nodes.note: Positioned in a tunnel above 5. You actually have to go back to 5 to move between the left and right portions of this junction, but access both ways has the same requirements.

strats.name: West Sand Hole Space Wall Climb
West Sand Hole MidAir Morph
strats.note: Maybe that midair morph could be a tech as well?
